item.description:
7:30-10:30pm

Do you sometimes feel 'invaded' by the energy of those around you?
Do you have trouble saying no to requests?
Do you sometimes loose your sense of self and personal power when in relation to others?
Are you a healer who sometimes takes on your clients 'stuff'?


If you answered yes to any of the questions above, this workshop if for you!

Learn simple, potent techniques you can put into action immediately to:

protect your energy field
ground and center when experiencing emotion
become aware of where your energy field ends and where another's begins
create permeable boundaries to let in the good, and keep out the unhealthy
increase your effectiveness in manifesting that which you desire

Location will be emailed upon registration.
item.how_to_find_us: Location will be emailed upon registration.
item.name: Women's Empowerment Evening
